message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I trust that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed with the purchase.
